campaign.ended: The campaign has ended.  For regular donations, please use the main donation page.
campaign.about-si-text-1: Social Income is a nonprofit organization based in Switzerland that provides unconditional cash transfers via mobile phone to people living in multidimensional poverty in West Africa.
campaign.about-si-text-2: Since 2020, Social Income has been running an open-ended universal basic income program in Sierra Leone.
